mapper.insert: insert into MUSIC (title, singer, year, category, producer, nationality, link, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{singer}, #{year}, #{category}, #{producer}, #{nationality}, #{link}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select * from MUSIC order by seq desc
mapper.update: update MUSIC set title=#{title}, singer=#{singer}, year=#{year}, category=#{category}, producer=#{producer}, nationality=#{nationality}, link=#{link}, content=#{content} where seq = #{seq}
